title: The Phoenix and the Carpet
author: E. Nesbit
description: Five British children discover in their new carpet an egg, which hatches into a phoenix that takes them on a series of fantastic adventures around the world.

title: Beyond the Ocean Door
author: John Smith
description: An epic journey begins when a sailor stumbles upon a mysterious door in the middle of the sea.

title: Alone
author: Sarah Adams
description: A heartfelt story of self-discovery and survival in a world that seems to have turned its back.

title: A Million to One
author: Juanita Rosen
description: Two strangers cross paths in a city of dreams, where love is the rarest chance of all.

title: The Killer Poison
author: Liam Hunter
description: A toxic mystery unfolds as a detective races to stop a string of murders tied to a lethal substance.

title: Really Good Actually
author: Monica Heisey
description: A sharp and hilarious novel about heartbreak, therapy, and figuring out life after a breakup.

title: Roman
author: M. J. Carter
description: A historical tale set in the Roman Empire, following a rebelâ€™s rise through politics and blood.

title: Don't Look Back
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout
description: A teenage girl with amnesia must piece together what happened the night her best friend disappeared.
